TopicTitle: KPT: Kerbal Personnel Transport (w/ ISA MapSat GPS locator)

Articles.Content:
Here is my 2 crew, 4 passenger Kerbal Personnel Transport ship.

With ISA MapSat GPS locator. No MapSat dish.

The center booster is equiped with an Octo1 probe body and a Clamp-o-tron docking port so you can leave it in orbit for re-docking and re-fueling. Can easily get to Mun or Minimus without refueling. And should be capable of reaching Duna or Eve once the booster is re-fueled in orbit.

Also comes equipped with 2 Go-Cart mini-rovers as seen here:

Best to land on flat terrain to be sure Go-Carts land wheels down. But in the event that they stand on end you can lower/raise landing legs to help nudge them over.

If all else fails, get one of your Kerbalnauts to stand under the Go-Cart and get it to glance off his head.

Craft file: KPT: Kerbal Personnel Transport

ACTION KEYS:

0 = Solar Panels/Instruments

1 = Toggle Center Mainsail

2 = Toggle LV-N's

3 = Toggle Lander LV-909's

9 = Toggle gimbals

Edited April 30, 2013 by Landge
Very nice!! I was able to land on the Mun and explore all my anomalies.
